sql:
SELECT
    TRUNC(ce.charttime, 'DD') AS x_time,
    AVG(ce.valuenum) AS y_value
FROM chartevents ce
WHERE ce.itemid = :itemid
  AND ce.valuenum IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY TRUNC(ce.charttime, 'DD')
ORDER BY x_time

SELECT
    TRUNC(e.charttime, 'DD') AS x_time,
    SUM(e.value) AS y_value
FROM outputevents e
WHERE e.itemid = :itemid
  AND e.value IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY TRUNC(e.charttime, 'DD')
ORDER BY x_time

SELECT
    {group_col} AS x_group,
    AVG({measure_col}) AS y_value
FROM {table_name}
WHERE {measure_col} IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY {group_col}
ORDER BY y_value DESC

SELECT
    {group_col} AS x_group,
    COUNT(*) AS y_value
FROM {table_name}
WHERE {group_col} IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY {group_col}
ORDER BY y_value DESC

SELECT
    {group_col} AS x_group,
    MEDIAN({measure_col}) AS y_value
FROM {table_name}
WHERE {measure_col} IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY {group_col}
ORDER BY y_value DESC

SELECT
    TRUNC({time_col}, 'DD') AS x_time,
    COUNT(*) AS y_value
FROM {table_name}
WHERE {time_col} IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY TRUNC({time_col}, 'DD')
ORDER BY x_time
